alert.note: Alert for Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 08 at 1:14PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Mobile and southwestern Baldwin Counties through 200 PM CDT... At 110 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated a strong thunderstorm 4 miles west of Theodore, moving east at 20 mph. A couple of other strong storms elsewhere over southern Mobile county are also moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Midtown Mobile, Downtown Mobile, Daphne, Tillmans Corner, Fairhope, Theodore, Spanish Fort, Point Clear and I10 And I65. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Baldwin Central; Baldwin Coastal; Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal
